name: Brick Magnet
description:
Use electrons and positrons to destroy all the bricks on the screen. Be careful because if electrons and positrons collide, they will be annihilated!

Your paddle is also magnetic and you can use this to control the electrons and positrons. Use space or left mouse button to reverse polarity.

Disconnect bricks from the white brick and they will be destroyed automatically. Collect bonuses dropped from green bricks. Get extra balls by destroying red and blue bricks.

There is a timer on the top right corner. Try to get the best time!

Controls

  • Start / Pause: S/Enter
  • Reverse polarity / shoot: Space / Left mouse button
